description.p: Echo Cleaner is a modern, elegant system cleaning tool designed for Linux users, with special focus on developers. It helps you reclaim disk space by safely removing unnecessary files, caches, and temporary data.

ul.li: Smart system cache cleaning (package managers, logs, trash)
Docker cleanup (dangling images, stopped containers, unused volumes)
Kubernetes local cluster cleanup (minikube, kind)
Development dependencies cleanup (npm, gradle, maven caches)
Beautiful, intuitive interface with contextual controls
Real-time preview of what will be deleted
Selective cleaning - choose exactly what to remove
